backend/main.mo: Defines resident-related data types and comparison helpers, and includes authorization and storage mixins in an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for major frontend components, hooks, dialogs, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Primary production deployment checklist covering verification steps, manual and scripted deploy flows, and troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/deployment_logs/.gitkeep: Documentation for the deployment logs directory describing generated log and canister ID files and their purpose.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_VERSION_89.md: Historical deployment checklist specific to Version 89 with publish-only steps and limited smoke tests.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the frontend root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/build-meta.json: Placeholder build metadata file overwritten during deployment.
frontend/scripts/clean_redeploy_producti: Cleans build artifacts, injects metadata, rebuilds the frontend, and redeploys to production with logging.
frontend/scripts/deploy_version_89_publi: Historical script for retrying version 89 publish-only deployment to the IC network.
frontend/scripts/post_deploy_smoke_test_: Interactive script guiding operators through post-deployment smoke tests and verifying artifacts.
frontend/scripts/redeploy_production.sh: Rebuilds the frontend with metadata and redeploys to production, logging repository state and canister IDs.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_VERSION_89.md: Detailed post-deployment smoke test instructions for Version 89 including authentication, dashboard loading, and error checks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, actor initialization, startup health checks, and routing.
frontend/src/components/AddAdlRecordDial: Dialog form for adding an ADL record, collecting date, activity, assistance level, and notes, then submitting via useAddAdlRecord. Handles validation, reset, and toast errors.
frontend/src/components/AddDailyVitalsDi: Dialog for recording daily vitals including temperature, blood pressure, pulse, respiration, oxygen saturation, and optional glucose. Converts units, validates fields, and submits via useAddDailyVitals.
frontend/src/components/AddMarRecordDial: Dialog to log medication administration by selecting an active medication and entering time, administrator, and notes. Submits a MAR record using useAddMarRecord.
frontend/src/components/AddMedicationDia: Form dialog for adding a new medication with dosage, route, schedule, prescribing physician, and notes. Splits administration times and submits via useAddMedication.
frontend/src/components/AddResidentDialo: Large admin‑gated dialog for creating a new resident with personal info, room data, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons. Supports multi-entry lists and submits via useAddResident.
frontend/src/components/AddWeightEntryDi: Dialog form for submitting a new weight entry for a resident, handling validation, unit selection, notes, and backend mutation submission.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Moritz Care Home logo with size/mode options and a text fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsIndic: Shows frontend build info and backend canister ID with fallback logic and warnings when metadata is missing or unavailable.
frontend/src/components/EditMedicationDi: Dialog for editing an existing medication with pre‑filled fields, physician lookup, and submission to update backend data.
frontend/src/components/EditResidentDial: Comprehensive resident editing dialog including personal info, physicians, pharmacy, insurance, and responsible persons with admin access checks.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup form allowing a user to save their name and employee ID through a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ResidentPhotoUpl: File exists but contains no implementation content.
frontend/src/components/StartupErrorScre: A UI component that displays startup errors with diagnostics, authentication info, and retry/logout controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, status tracking, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and updating user profiles and other backend data, with startup-safe and timeout-aware variants.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Builds a fault-tolerant backend actor with timeouts and optional admin-token initialization, exposing status and retry controls.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base setup defining light/dark themes, dialog overrides, and print-specific layout and styling rules.
frontend/src/lib/actorInit.ts: Provides timeout-wrapped promises and helpers to classify backend, network, and timeout errors.
frontend/src/lib/assetUrl.ts: Builds base-path-safe asset URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL with cleanup of slashes.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Retrieves build/version metadata from env vars or a fallback file and generates build identifiers.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Converts dates to/from backend nanoseconds and provides formatting and age calculation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/residentEnumMapping.ts: Maps RoomType and ResidentStatus enums to/from UI string values with backward-compatible helpers.
frontend/src/lib/startupDiagnostics.ts: Extracts backend diagnostics and performs a timeout-protected health check on the canister.
frontend/src/lib/startupTimings.ts: Defines central timeout constants for various startup operations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing active and discharged residents with admin-only discharge/delete actions and error retry states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with a styled card, background image, and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfile.tsx: Resident profile page fetching detailed resident data with admin-gated editing, multiple record dialogs, and retry/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, animations, and container settings for the project UI theme.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing authorization issues, pending feature requests, and architectural notes.
